amendment.purpose: An amendment to require that the provisions of the Buy American Act be included in the bill.

action.text: Traficant amendment (A001) modified by unanimous consent. The modification inserts "It shall be the sense of the Congress" at the beginning of the text of the matter proposed to be inserted, but the sense of Congress provision will not diminish the responsibility of the Director to notify prospective applicants of the requirements of the Buy American Act.
On agreeing to the Traficant amendment (A001) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
